mapper.insert: insert into dl_work_msg (id, msg_name, msg_time, work_id, msg_content) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{workId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into dl_work_msg
id,
msg_name,
msg_time,
work_id,
msg_content,

mapper.update:
update dl_work_msg
msg_name = #{msgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msg_time = #{msgTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msg_content = #{msgContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from dl_work_msg where 1=1 and work_id=#{workId} ORDER BY msg_time ASC
